definition: metacarpal bone (long bones in the hand and feet)
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield

sentences.english: Fixation pins were placed in the 2 3 metacarpal and radial shaft.
sentences.chinese: 外固定针固定在2～3掌骨和桡骨干上。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of the Titanium minitype plate and screw in the treatment of metacarpus fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨钛质微型钢板螺钉治疗掌骨骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: The peak age of metacarpal maturation was 1 year earlier in urban areas than in rural ones.
sentences.chinese: 城市比乡村少年的掌骨发育高峰年龄提前1岁。

sentences.english: Fracture healing of the metacarpal in goat has been observed with X-ray diagnostic techniques.
sentences.chinese: 利用X线诊断技术，观察山羊的掌骨骨折愈合情况。

sentences.english: The type and location of an extraarticular osteotomy in the metacarpals or phalanges depend on a number of issues.
sentences.chinese: 许多因素决定掌骨或指骨关节外截骨术的方法和部位。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the treatment of traumatic metacarpal defect.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性掌骨缺损的显微外科治疗。

definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
Quchi acupoint LI11, at the lateral end of the elbow crease
